fields.title: COMPOSITES EUROPE
fields.description: COMPOSITES EUROPE is the most innovative fair in the European composites market and showcases the complete value sector of the industry. International researchers, developers and decision makers meet the users of the composites industry, whose key technologies and applications are the focus of attention: Automotive, aerospace, lightweight construction, wind energy, and more.

fields.title: HYBRID Expo
fields.description:
HYBRID Expo is the trade fair for the development and production of hybrid components and their application industries.

It displays the complete process chain of preliminary products, semi-finished products and finished composite components incorporating metals, plastics and other materials.

With its special focus on components made out of two or more basic materials as well as on integrated manufacturing technologies it presents solutions for the current challenges regarding integration of functions, resource efficiency and reduction of processing times.

Decision-makers, buyers, designers and constructers from the most important processing and application industries, such as the automotive, electronics industries in specific but also white goods, machine building / plant construction and aerospace etc. industries, come to find the latest material solutions and technologies.

fields.title: Bar Convent Berlin
fields.description: Bar Convent Berlin is the premium trade show and conference for the national and international professionals of the bar and spirits community, targeting international spirits and liquors producers, distributors, bartenders, bar owners and connoisseurs. BCB is taking place at the Station Berlin, one of the most trendy event locations in the city, and features alongside of brand presentations one-on-one interactions with top international speakers, mixology classes, seminars and tastings. BCB caters mainly to bartenders and has a networking as well as educational character, allowing bar staff to become acquainted with new drinks and trends in the industry.

fields.title: viscom Düsseldorf
fields.description:
viscom Düsseldorf connects the entire international visual communication community from Signmaking to Digital Signage, presenting innovative technologies and the latest developments.

viscom addresses marketing decision-makers from trade and industry, machinery and material buyers as well as small trade. It is the only place where you can find the entire industry.

Value is added through extensive seminar programmes focused especially on the different visitor target groups.

fields.title: PSI Trade Show
fields.description: The PSI Trade Show in Düsseldorf is the leading International trade show and the first meeting point for the promotional product industry where suppliers present their new products and trends. Major players of the industry make best use of this international networking platform by preparing their upcoming business year.

fields.title: Passenger Experience Conference
fields.description: The Passenger Experience Conference is the international must attend conference to discover the future direction of cabin innovation, consumer expectations and onboard strategies. Supporting the professional growth and development of individuals within the aircraft interiors and passenger experience industry.
fields.venue: CCH - Congress Center Hamburg, Hamburg, Germany
